001
002package src.model;
003/**
004 * Creates centralized object for product properties
005*/
006public class product {
007    private int id;
008    private String productName;
009    private double price;
010
011    /**
012     * Creates new product object with all attributes.
013     *
014     * @param id - The unique identifier for the product
015     * @param productName - The name of the product
016     * @param price - The price of the product
017     */
018    public product(int id, String productName, double price) {
019        this.id = id;
020        this.productName = productName;
021        this.price = price;
022    }
023    
024    /* getting value */
025    /**
026     * Retrieves the product ID.
027     *
028     * @return - The unique identifier for each product. 
029    */
030    public int getId() { return id; }
031    /**
032     * Retrieves the product name.
033     *
034     * @return - The name of the product
035     */
036    public String getProductName() { return productName; }
037    /**
038     * Retrieves the product price.
039     *
040     * @return - The price of the product
041    */
042    public double getPrice() { return price; }
043}
044
045
